calendarHelp: You can't create a poll without any options. Add at least one option to continue.
commentPlaceholder: Leave a comment on this poll (visible to everyone)
deletePollDescription: All data related to this poll will be deleted. To confirm, please type <s>‚Äú{{confirmText}}‚Äù</s> in to the input below:
deletingOptionsWarning: You are deleting options that participants have voted for. Their votes will also be deleted.
demoPollNotice: Demo polls are automatically deleted after 1 day
descriptionPlaceholder: Hey everyone, please choose the dates that work for you!
endingGuestSessionNotice: Once a guest session ends it cannot be resumed. You will not be able to edit any votes or comments you've made with this session.
errorCreate: Uh oh! There was a problem creating your poll. The error has been logged and we'll try to fix it.
guestPollNotice: Please login to make sure you do not lose the ability to manage this poll.
guestSessionNotice: You are using a guest session. This allows us to recognize you if you come back later so you can edit your votes.
linkHasExpired: Your link has expired or is no longer valid
loginMagicLinkSent: A magic link has been sent to:
loginViaMagicLinkDescription: We'll send you an email with a magic link that you can use to login.
loginWithValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
groupMeetingsDescription: Find the best date to schedule a group meeting
mixedOptionsDescription: You can't have both time and date options in the same poll. Which would you like to keep?
name: Name
notificationsLoginRequired: You need to login to change your notifications settings
notificationsNoUser: This poll is not claimed by any user
notificationsOnDescription: An email will be sent to {{email}} when there is activity on this poll.
noVotes: No one has voted for this option
pollOwnerNotice: Hey {{name}}, looks like you are the owner of this poll.
shareDescription: Give this link to your participants to allow them to vote on your poll.
specifyTimesDescription: Include start and end times for each option
title: Title
unclaimedNoticeDescription: This poll has not been claimed by a registered user.
unclaimedNoticeTitle: Are you the owner of this poll?
unverifiedMessage: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a link to verify the email address.
userAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists
userNotFound: A user with that email doesn't exist
verificationCodeHelp: Didn't get the email? Check your spam/junk.
verificationCodeSent: A verification code has been sent to {{email}} Change
timezonePolicyAutomaticDescription: Adjust times for participants in different time zones
timezonePolicyFixedDescription: Show participants the same times regardless of their time zone
whyLoginAnswer: As a guest, your content is associated to a temporary user that is tied to your current web browser. Logging in ensures you do not lose access to your content if your browser data is deleted since it will be tied to your account instead.
wrongVerificationCode: Your verification code is incorrect or has expired
